Class EmployeeBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.info.managedbean.EmployeeBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EmployeeBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Managed bean for handling employee information.

    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getEmployees

        public java.util.List<Employee> getEmployees()
        Getter method for employees. If compId is set to value other than null list of all employees of company with that id is retrieved from database. Otherwise, empty list is returned.
        Returns:
        List of all employees of company if compId is not null, or empty list, otherwise.

      • setEmployees

        public void setEmployees(java.util.List<Employee> employees)
        Setter method for employees.
        Parameters:
        employees - List of employees to set.

      • getCompId

        public java.lang.Integer getCompId()
        Getter method for compId.
        Returns:
        id of company.

      • setCompId

        public void setCompId(java.lang.Integer compId)
        Setter method for compId.
        Parameters:
        compId - id of company to set.

      • getEmpId

        public java.lang.Integer getEmpId()
        Getter method for empId.
        Returns:
        id of employee.

      • setEmpId

        public void setEmpId(java.lang.Integer empId)
        Setter method for empId.
        Parameters:
        empId - id of employee to set.

      • getEmployee

        public Employee getEmployee()
        Getter method for employee. If empId is set to value other than null employee with that id is retrieved from database. Otherwise, new employee is initialized.
        Returns:
        employee with empId if that id is not null, or newly initialized employee, otherwise.

      • setEmployee

        public void setEmployee(Employee employee)
        Setter method for employee.
        Parameters:
        employee - employee to set.

      • getCompany

        public Company getCompany()
        Getter method for company. If compId is set to value other than null company with that id is retrieved from database. Otherwise, new company is initialized.
        Returns:
        company with compId if that id is not null, or newly initialized company, otherwise.

      • setCompany

        public void setCompany(Company company)
        Setter method for company.
        Parameters:
        company - company to set.

      • addNewEmployee

        public java.lang.String addNewEmployee()
        Method for adding new employee. Probably, for this purpose it is better to use void addNewEmployee(ActionEvent ae).
        Returns:
        employee details view in case of successful employee addition.

      • updateEmployee

        public java.lang.String updateEmployee()
        Method for updating an employee. Probably, for this purpose it is better to use void updateEmployee(ActionEvent ae).
        Returns:
        employee details view in case of successful employee update.

      • deleteEmployee

        public java.lang.String deleteEmployee()
        Method for deleting an employee. Probably, for this purpose it is better to use void deleteEmployee(ActionEvent ae).
        Returns:
        list of all employees view in case of successful employee deletion.
